description: This file defines a class WebBrowserTools that provides methods for opening web pages in a browser, specifically encapsulating webbrowser module functions within a toolkit framework.

classes.name: WebBrowserTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for opening web pages in a browser

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the WebBrowserTools with a list containing the open_page method

methods.name: open_page
methods.description: Opens a URL in a web browser, either in a new window or tab based on the parameter
